pageContext.claim: “Everybody understands there was no collusion. There's no Russia. It was all made up by the Democrats. They're the ones that colluded with Russia. The Democrats colluded with Russia.”
pageContext.analysis: The special counsel investigation into potential collusion between Russia and Trump's campaign and obstruction of justice continues, and no conclusions have been announced. As for alleged collusion between the Democrats and Russia, Trump is referring to the fact that Fusion GPS, which assembled a dossier as part of an assignment for Democrats, relied on a British intelligence agent who used Russian sources for his research. So that's a rather big stretch. The FBI had been tipped off before the dossier, anyway.
